name: Racing game (itch) (Loz667)
description:
This is a prototype racing game I have created using the Unity engine for my Level 5 HND in Games Design.

Controls for the vehicle are W/A/S/D. R will reset the time attempt.

Note that the friction on the track will differ dependant which terrain is being driven on.

Would love to get feedback on the level design as well as the gameplay.
